subject: Re: Unitron Marketing site update
preview: Thanks Rica,  I will need to ask one of my colleagues to have a look through it too. Will get back to you with any updates.  Thank you, have a blessed day!  Christine

Thanks Rica,

I will need to ask one of my colleagues to have a look through it too. Will get back to you with any updates.

Thank you, have a blessed day!

Hi Christine, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://unitronmarketing.com.au/marketing-catalogue/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

All updates are now live on the Blu page. Are you referring to the new marketing catalogue?

If so, please review it here: https://unitronmarketing.com.au/marketing-catalogue-updated/

If this is the correct content, let us know so we can publish it live.
@rica can you please look into this request?
